title.value: Разделение зерновой массы по удельной плотности на сепараторе вибропневматического принципа действия
Dispersion of grain mass by specific density on  vibro-pneumatic separator
Dispersion of grain mass by specific density on  vibro-pneumatic separator

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Zelenko, S.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article deals with the technological features of the process of separation of the components of cereal mixture on the specific density under the influence of vibration and air updraft. The design of the separator developed on pneumatic vibration principle of the new design solutions is described in the article. The separator allows significantly improve the efficiency of the process of separation of the components of the grain mass according the specific density. The studies reveal that germination energy and seed germination depends on the biological value of the seeds, and the biological value of the seed is characterized not only by the geometrical parameters of the seed itself, but is connected with specific density, which is associated with ripeness and the kind of seeds.
